title: Study Scene of Paris

provenance_text:
Antoine Vollon [1833-1900], Paris, France. Dr. and Mrs. Daniel Fishkoff, Colonia, NJ, by December 4, 1975 [1]; their gift to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, December 1975.
